listitem.para: -H|help Show a simple help screen as a reminder of options which are understood by the application
-V|version Show the current release version for reference
-N|nickname={file/uri} Import nicknames by parsing a text stream from various sources

java-jarfcparsers.jar--nickname=switch44.zoneshow ParseresultsforAliShowZoneParser: Zones:44 Aliases:112(nameswithoneormoreWWPNs) Aliases:136(name/WWPNtuples) In this example, a zone file was parsed by the AliShowZoneParser resulting in 112 nicknames; due to duplicate nicknames, there are actually 136 unique WWPN/alias tuples, which means that (136-112) 24 of the WWPNs have the same alias as other WWPNs
-!|check Run an internal check that dependent drivers are available and registered
